sentences.en: A hundred acres of land was made into a peach and pear orchard.
sentences.cn: 100英亩土地改为种桃和梨的果园.

sentences.en: Careful orchard planning at the beginning pays dividends later.
sentences.cn: 在开始建园设计时要周密考虑,栽后才能得到收益.

sentences.en: Each bamboo house was surrounded by a thriving orchard.
sentences.cn: 每座竹楼周围都是茂密的果园.

sentences.en: From the southern side of the said orchard ran a long road.
sentences.cn: 上述这个果园的南边有一条长街.

sentences.en: In practice, wind - borne pollen from outside will enter an orchard.
sentences.cn: 实际上, 来自园外的花粉会随风飘到园内.

sentences.en: Look at that little persimmon orchard in the west valley.
sentences.cn: 你瞧,西面山涯里那一片柿树,红得多么好看.

sentences.en: My orchard is bearing well this year.
sentences.cn: 今年我的果园果实累累.

sentences.en: Next door to the garage is a small orchard area.
sentences.cn: 紧挨着车库是一座小果园。

sentences.en: Pomona jumped up, furious, and ordered him out of the orchard.
sentences.cn: 波蒙娜一下跳了起来, 火冒三丈, 命令他离开果园.

sentences.en: Repairs for machinery and general orchard supplies are readily available.
sentences.cn: 就近修理机器和果园一般工具很方便.

sentences.en: The immediate orchard boundary should consist of a fire - break.
sentences.cn: 紧靠种子园边界应设有防火线.

sentences.en: They carved out an orchard where there were wild grass.
sentences.cn: 他们在曾是野草丛生的地方开辟了果园.

sentences.en: They have found areas suitable for seed orchard purposes.
sentences.cn: 他们找到了适于营建种子园的地区.

sentences.en: Until his death in 1986 Greenwood owned and operated an enormous pear orchard.
sentences.cn: 到他1986年去世前，格林伍德一直拥有并管理着一片面积广阔的梨园。

sentences.en: We're going to steal some apples from farmer Jones's orchard. Why won't you come with us? Lost your bottle?
sentences.cn: 我们要去农民琼斯的果园里偷苹果, 你为什么不和我们一起去? 你害怕了?

phrases.tran_cn: 乌节路（新加坡最出名的购物街道）

trans.tran_cn: （通常指围起来的）果园，果园里的全部果树，<俚>棒球场
trans.tran_en: a place where fruit trees are grown
